title: How our stories cross over
description: Colin Grant has spent a lifetime navigating the emotional landscape between his father’s world and his own. Born in England to Jamaican parents, Grant draws on stories of shared experience within his immigrant community -- and reflects on how he found forgiveness for a father who rejected him.
author: Colin Grant
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, children, culture, family, history, identity, parenting, society, storytelling
